description:
When true the determinate progress modal is displayed.  
When false the indeterminate progress loader is displayed.
The title displayed at the top of the determinate progress modal.
The message displayed above the determinate progress modal's progress bar or below the indeterminate progress loader.
Allows the user to close the determinate progress modal if true.
An integer representing the current progress.  Used for displaying the progress bar on the determinate progress modal.
An integer representing the maximum progress.  Used for displaying the progress bar on the determinate progress modal.
